description: This file is a shell script to configure and manage GRE tunnels for a hotspot setup, including setting system parameters, creating tunnels, configuring network interfaces, and setting iptables rules.

methods.name: init_snooper_sysevents
methods.description: Initializes system events for snooper logs by enabling circuit and remote snooper.

methods.name: read_init_params
methods.description: Retrieves initial configuration parameters from PSM database.

methods.name: create_tunnel
methods.description: Creates GRE tunnel interfaces and bridges, configures network interfaces, and prepares tunneling.

methods.name: init_keepalive_sysevents
methods.description: Sets system events related to hotspot keep-alive monitoring.

methods.name: update_bridge_config
methods.description: Configures iptables rules for network traffic filtering.
